document_data.name: Arnagus
document_data.mainbody: '''Arnagus the Shipwright''' was the wealthiest shipbuilder in [[Waterdeep]] in [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Arnagus was a strong and vital man. He was truly friendly with all people that he met but often had few words to say, even to friends he knew for years.
document_data.Activities: As a shipbuilder with a great reputation, Arnagus was very influential in the [[Order of Master Shipwrights]]. He was also an able handler and trader. For his profound knowledge about the city's docks, he often helped the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] with crimes that happened in the port.
